name: Light (itch) (floney)
description:
Light A puzzle-platformer maze game Control a blue lightbulb searching for the key in a dark maze. But you have to watch out for the blind guards with killing light vision. With no physical mechanics to fight back, you can only win by playing with their minds. So where is the key? Controls
  • Arrow keys/WASD for directional movement
  • Space bar for dark mode
Features
  • Intelligent Enemy AI
  • Interesting Puzzles
